item.description:
Hyatt Regency Boston (in Downtown Crossing)
1 Avenue de Lafayette, Boston

9pm doors
9:30pm-10:30pm OPEN bar, appetizers, and **speed mingling**
And dancing ALL night long
75% of all event profits benefit GLADs 6x12 initiative, bringing marriage equality to all New England states by 2012

Tickets are available through http://reveal.sqeegee...

This event is strictly 21+

Please note that this is not a Dyke March event. We are just trying to help promote this event for our friends, MadFemmePride and GLAD. Please check out the MadFemmePride site for the latest up-to-date details.
item.how_to_find_us: Several Dyke Marchers will be there.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: MadFemmePride's REVEAL 2009 - New Years Celebration and GLAD Benefit
